attributes.action: we ask the government to legislate to make knives rounded at the front by law
attributes.additional_details: we hear of people being stabbed regular  causing serious injury and death , by rounding the front of knives it will make it harder for it to penetrate the human body hence could save lives. There is no culinary reason why a knife has to be pointed.
attributes.background: We want parliament to make it law that all sharp knives have to be rounded at the front to make it harder for them to penetrate the human body.
